data.name: Outrunner 2 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 25 tracks composed by Kaitai The Maid and i'vegotlevelup.

Enjoy the thrilling chiptune and nintendocore tracks!

1. Kaitai The Maid - I Like Waka Flocka Because My Sister Says He Is Cool
2. Kaitai The Maid - Blurred
3. Kaitai The Maid - Chaisaw With Its Own Feelings
4. Kaitai The Maid - Dino, destroy the city
5. Kaitai The Maid - Ever
6. Kaitai The Maid - Genesis
7. Kaitai The Maid - Maitai Teh Kaid
8. Kaitai The Maid - Never Knows Best
9. Kaitai The Maid - Outrageous
10. Kaitai The Maid - Season
11. Kaitai The Maid - Speaking With Empty Streets
12. Kaitai The Maid - Rewind this
13. Kaitai The Maid - Overrated
14. i'vegotlevelup - Blablabla
15. i'vegotlevelup - Broken
16. i'vegotlevelup - Cosmos, bleeps and starships
17. i'vegotlevelup - Decay
18. i'vegotlevelup - Demo_2013
19. i'vegotlevelup - H3llo
20. i'vegotlevelup - I got the swag and it_s pumpin out my overies
21. i'vegotlevelup - Kanjo
22. i'vegotlevelup - Summer
23. i'vegotlevelup - Say
24. i'vegotlevelup - Until [the end]
25. i'vegotlevelup - Unrealeased #1
